title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
summary: Provide customers with a secure login process using multi-factor authentication.
description: Develop a secure authentication mechanism that combines multiple verification factors such as password, OTP, and biometric verification to ensure customer account safety. Implement session timeout, device recognition, and encrypted storage of authentication tokens. The solution should adhere to industry compliance standards like PCI-DSS and ensure effortless yet secure customer access to online banking services.

title: Personalized Banking Dashboard
summary: Deliver a personalized dashboard displaying customer-specific financial products and services.
description: Develop a dynamic dashboard that presents account information, personalized offers, and product recommendations based on user profiles and eligibility. The dashboard should provide quick access to account balances, transactions, and actionable shortcuts for managing services. Integrate backend systems to ensure real-time updates with a visually appealing and intuitive layout for improved user experience.

title: Responsive and Accessible User Interface
summary: Ensure the portal performs optimally across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
description: Design a responsive web interface that automatically adjusts to different screen sizes and device types. Implement accessibility features compliant with WCAG standards to ensure usability for all customers. The interface should maintain consistent navigation, load speed, and interactivity, providing a seamless experience across browsers and operating systems.

title: Digital Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
summary: Allow customers to open accounts and modify services digitally with guided workflows.
description: Build efficient, guided workflows enabling customers to open new accounts or request modifications to existing services quickly. Implement automated eligibility checks, digital KYC verification, and workflow progress tracking. Ensure backend system connectivity for real-time processing and provide clearly defined steps with minimal manual input to enhance overall speed and customer satisfaction.

title: Save and Resume Functionality
summary: Enable customers to pause an incomplete application and resume later.
description: Introduce a save-and-resume feature allowing users to securely save progress on applications or service requests, ensuring no data loss between sessions. Use encrypted storage and session tracking to maintain privacy. Incorporate progress indicators and automated reminders for pending applications to promote ease of completion across devices.

title: Secure Document Upload and Verification
summary: Allow customers to upload and verify required supporting documents directly through the portal.
description: Implement encrypted document upload functionality supporting multiple file types for purposes such as identity verification and product applications. Automate verification processes with backend review integrations and document validation tools. Ensure uniform handling of uploaded documents, tracking approval or rejection statuses through real-time updates for maximum transparency.

title: Real-Time Request Tracking and Notifications
summary: Provide live status updates and notifications for submitted applications and requests.
description: Develop a live status tracking system to show real-time updates of customer-submitted requests such as account openings or service modifications. Integrate notification services through email, SMS, and in-portal alerts to keep customers informed about approvals, pending steps, and completion. Ensure synchronization with backend systems for accurate and timely information delivery.

title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Activity Log
summary: Track and maintain a complete record of customer interactions and activity for transparency.
description: Implement a secure activity logging framework to capture user events such as logins, document uploads, and service requests. The logs must include timestamps, status changes, and system interactions to ensure compliance and traceability. Provide customers a summarized view of their interaction history while enabling administrators to generate detailed reports for audit and governance purposes.

title: Core Banking System Integration Layer
summary: Integrate the self-service portal seamlessly with the bank's core system for real-time processing.
description: Develop an API-based integration layer connecting the self-service portal to the existing core banking system. Support two-way data exchange for balance inquiries, transaction logs, and account status updates. Include tools for asynchronous data synchronization, error management, and retry mechanisms to ensure consistent data availability and minimal downtime.

title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
summary: Implement role-based access management according to user profiles and authorization levels.
description: Establish a role-based access control framework that manages access based on user roles such as customers, support staff, and administrators. Define permissions for viewing, editing, and administering resources with centralized audit visibility. Include mechanisms for privilege escalation requests and strict session monitoring to ensure data protection and regulatory compliance.

title: Dedicated Portal Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Maintain a standalone, high-performance database environment for the self-service portal.
description: Create a secure and optimized database architecture to store portal-specific data such as user profiles, applications, and logs. Implement caching, indexing, and performance tuning for high efficiency during peak loads. Ensure data encryption, automated backups, and failover mechanisms for continuous availability. Monitor system performance and scalability to support future growth requirements.
